xtc.lang.blink.agent

Interface AgentNativeDeclaration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Blink, NativeCDB, NativeGDB

    public interface AgentNativeDeclaration
    The Blink Agent's constant values visible to the Blink through the Java component debugger. The constant here should be consistent with the agent.h file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BDA_BPTYPE_C2J_JNI_CALL
      The internal break point type name for c2j_call.
      static String BDA_BPTYPE_C2J_JNI_RETURN
      The internal break point type name for c2j_return.
      static String BDA_BPTYPE_J2C_DEBUGGER
      The internal break point type name for Java-to-native call.
      static String BDA_BPTYPE_J2C_JNI_CALL
      The internal breakpoint type name for j2c_call.
      static String BDA_BPTYPE_J2C_JNI_RETURN
      The internal breakpoint type name for j2c_return.
      static String BDA_BPTYPE_JNI_WARNING
      The internal JNI warning breakpoint.
      static String BDA_C2J
      Yield the control from C debugger to Java debugger.
      static String BDA_C2J_CALL_BREAKPOINT_VARIABLE
      A Blink debug agent's flag variable name that triggers a break point for a call during native-to-java transition.
      static String BDA_C2J_RETURN_BREAKPOINT_VARIABLE
      A Blink debug agent's flag variable name that triggers a break point for a return during native-to-java transition.
      static String BDA_CBP
      A blink agent's master breakpoint.
      static String BDA_CBP_BPTYPE
      C expression to get the break point type at the bda_cbp.
      static String BDA_CBP_STATE_JNI_ENV
      C expression to get the JNI environment variable at the bda_cbp.
      static String BDA_CBP_STATE_MESSAGE
      C expression to get the details message from the breakpoint.
      static String BDA_CBP_STATE_TRANSITIONS_IN_STACK
      C expression to get the JNI environment variable at the bda_cbp.
      static String BDA_CBP_TARGET_CNAME
      C expression to get the target java class name at the bda_cbp.
      static String BDA_CBP_TARGET_LINE_NUMBER
      C expression to get the target line number at the bda_cbp.
      static String BDA_CBP_TARGET_NATIVE_ADDRESS
      C expression to get the target native code address at the bda_cbp.
      static String BDA_DUMMY_JAVA
      The native entry to call the agent's Java dummy code.
      static String BDA_DUMMY_NATIVE
      The native entry to call the agent's native dummy code.
      static String BDA_ENSURE_JNIENV
      The native entry name to get JNI environment variable.
      static String BDA_GET_CURRENT_TRANSITION_COUNT
      The native entry name to get language transition count.
      static String BDA_J2C_CALL_BREAKPOINT_VARIABLE
      A Blink debug agent's flag variable name that triggers a breakpoint for a call before the java-to-native transition.
      static String BDA_J2C_RETURN_BREAKPOINT_VARIABLE
      A Blink debug agent's flag variable name that triggers a breakpoint for a return after the java-to-native transition.
      static String BDA_JDWP_REGION_BEGIN_VARIABLE
      The beginning address of the JDWP agent library.
      static String BDA_JDWP_REGION_END_VARIABLE
      The ending address of the the JDWP agent library.
      static String BDA_SHARED_LIBRARY_NAME
      Agent shared library name.
      static String BDA_TRANSITION_COUNT
      A Blink debug agent's variable name that constraint the condition for the language transition breakpoints.
